person.persName: James P. Bates (Provisional Government of Kentucky)

body.p: A Kentucky attorney and politician. Practiced law in Barren County, Kentucky and Bowling Green, Kentucky. Married to Harriet Bates. Father of Virginia Bates, William Bates, James Bates, John Bates, George Bates, Edward Bates, and Frank Bates. Member of the Jacksonian Democratic Party and the Democratic Party. Canvassed for Stephen A. Douglas in the 1860 presidential election. Served as a member of the Kentucky House of Representatives in 1836 for several terms. Served as a member of the Council of Ten in the Provisional Government of Kentucky. Returned to Bowling Green, Kentucky to practice law.
